content.rendered:
Directed by Remo D’Souza

Written by Shiraz Ahmed. Kiran Kotrial. Ali Jacko

Cast Anil Kapoor (Shamsher). Salman Khan (Sikander). Bobby Deol (Yash). Jacqueline Fernandez (Jessica). Daisy Shah (Sanjana). Saqib Saleem (Suraj). Freddy Daruwala (Rana) . Naushaad Abbas (Rana’s Henchmen). Najmeddin AlHadad (Mercenary).Kabir Ali.Anurag Arora. Shiv Aryan (Family Banker). Rajesh Babu (Cyrus). Krishna Banshak (Politician 4). Abhijit Baruah (Intelligence Officer). Rajesh Bhati (Balvinder). Divya Bhatia (Shrikant Verma). Dan Burns (Dancer). Cheche (Militant Captain).Saloni Chopra. Fernando Cruz (Bellboy). Munish Dev (Politician 1). Girish Dixit (Politician 2). Milind Gunaji (Ranchod Singh). Mannan Handa (Young Sikander). Narendra Jha (Khanna). Chaitanya Kanhaai (Narendra Pathak (as Chaitannya Kanh
ai)). Jakkrit Kanokpodjananon (Captain Cambodian).Dev K. Kantawall. Radhicka Kc (Rana’s Female Combatant #1). Imran Khan (Hotel Manager). Roman Khan (Sam). Bianca King(Dancer). Kamal Malik (Jailer). Maloslavskii (Mansion Security Head). Sohail Mirza (Rajan Mahapatra). Praveen Pachpore (Politician 7). Harsh Parnami (Politician 3). Behram Rana (Johnny Srivastava). Sharat Saxena (Raghu). Rajesh Sharma (Brijesh). Sanjeev Sharma (Politician 5). Nitansh Shrivastava (Minister’s PA). Syed Shujat (Bodyguard). Amit Singh (B R Chauhan). Amit Thakur (Politician). Girish Thapar (Politician 6). B.K. Tiwari (Gajendra Pathak). Braj Kishore Tiwari (Home Minister).Navdeep Tomar. Elena Tseluiko (Rana’s Female Combatant #2). Nishigandha Wad (Sumitra Ranchod Singh). Peter Wong(Cambodian Banker). Ali Abbas Zafar (Narrator (voice))

Language Hindi

Producers Chandru Bakhtiani. Narender Jani. Nasir Khan. Salman Khan. Sudhanshu Kumar. Yogendra Mogre. Hind Nabulsi. Kulthep Narula. Rachvin Narula. Mini Purushot. Kapil Sethi. Murli Shah. Prakash Talreja. Jaya Taurani. Ramesh Sadhuram Taurani

Production Salman Khan Film. Tips Industrie. Benetone Film
